How to use this tileset:
In Godot Engine:
1) Open your project and create a new TileSet resource.
2) Import the PNG files from the /Tileset PNGs/ folder.
3) Add your tiles (16Ã—16 px) to the TileSet and set collision shapes if needed.
4) Use the TileMap node to paint your game world!

In Unity:
1) Import the PNG files from the /Tileset PNGs/ folder into your project.
2) Set the sprite's Pixels Per Unit to 16.
3) Use Unity's Tilemap system to add tiles and paint your levels.

Need Help?
If you have any questions feel free to contact me!
